subject: Order #SSN3942
description_text: Hi, a week ago i got the pro x ultra pedals that i bought with a baseplate, i got the pedals but the baseplate is missing.

conversations.body_text: Hi UnaiCarsYT,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Currently, our German warehouse has depleted its floor stock. We will arrange urgent shipments through alternative channels.

Ok, thanks for the answer, is my baseplate one of the urgent shipments? And
can you give me an idea of how long is it going to take for it to be
shipped? I really love the pedals but without the baseplate i cannot attach
the clutch to the cockpit.

El mié, 17 dic 2025, 7:47, service@simsonn.com
Hi UnaiCarsYT,    Sorry, this is not a express shipping, as express shipping to Spain require customs duties. The delivery timeframe is 6-12 days.

Hi, you told me around a month ago that the sippment of the baseplate that
didnt come with my pedals was going to take between 6 and 12 days, but i
havnt got anything, i paid for the pedals and the baseplate and i would
like to know if you are going to send it to me.

El mié, 17 dic 2025, 8:56, service@simsonn.com
